articles.description: Sea otters on the California coast showed signs of a severe form of toxoplasmosis that had never been reported in sea otters or other aquatic animals before.
articles.content: The recent deaths of four sea otters discovered along CaliforniasCentral Coast have been linked to a strain of parasite that scientists are calling rare and unusual one that could also pose a threat … [+5552 chars]
